verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have decided
I have resolved
To wait upon you Lord
My rock and redeemer
shield and reward,
I'll wait upon you Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As surely as the sun will rise
You'll come to us
Certain as the dawn apears

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You'll come
Let your glory fall
As you respond to us
Spirit Reign
Flood into our thirst hearts again
You'll come
You'll come

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We are not shaken
We are not moved
We wait upon you Lord
Our mighty deliverer
Our triumph and truth
We wait upon you Lord

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
As surely as the sun will rise
You'll come to us
Certain as your word endures

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Chains be broken
Lives be healed
Eyes be opened
Christ is revealed
